channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing Bin at Borough Hall, 25th August
item.description:
There are overflowing bins outside Borough Hall. I imagine these are private bins, but because they stay out 24/7 in a public space they are continually filled, but not emptied at the same frequency as other bins. They overflow, attack foxes, and flys. They need cleared, and the operators need to remove them while there are no events in progress. They are not maintaining them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin with household rubbish, 25th August
item.description:
Multiple large black bin bags overflowing the Burney Street Garden litter bin. with excess rubbish piled around. Needs collection and clearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Hill, London

item.title: Commercial waste bin wheels missing, 25th August
item.description:
Front wheels are missing from commercial waste bin so isn't being emptied. Bin belongs to Escocesa 167 Stokey Newington church street N16 0AR. Bin is kept in the alleyway next to 37 Kersley Road, N16 0NT

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kersley Road, Hackney, London
